Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")]
[<System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")>]

summary.span: 向符合成员条件的代码程序集授予权限以操作位于代码程序集中的文件。

span.span: Grants permission to manipulate files located in the code assemblies to code assemblies that match the membership condition.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别都包含一个可以具有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组都可以有自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展为任意数目的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组都有一个成员条件，确定给定程序集是否属于该程序集的证据。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 只有其成员条件与给定程序集匹配的代码组及其子代码组才会应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 具有与相同的子匹配语义 。 has the same child matching semantics as . 但 会返回一个权限集，该权限集包含动态计算 的，该权限集向运行代码的目录授予文件访问权限; 仅返回静态权限集。However, returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run; only returns a static permission set. 所授予的文件访问的类型作为参数传递到构造函数。The type of file access granted is passed as a parameter to the constructor. 此代码组仅匹配通过文件协议运行的程序集，即具有指向文件或 UNC 路径的 Url 的程序集。This code group only matches assemblies run over a file protocol, that is, assemblies that have URLs that point to a file or UNC path. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类的成员 。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个基本的代码组。This constructor creates a basic code group. 可以通过方法添加子代码组 。Child code groups can be added with the method. 返回一个包含动态计算的权限集的权限集 ，该权限集向运行代码的目录授予文件访问权限。 returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run. 所授予的访问权限的类型由 `access` 参数确定。The type of access granted is determined by the `access` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Resolve (evidence As Evidence) As PolicyStatement

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 对一组证据解析代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集，此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果存在匹配项，则此方法返回代码组的策略声明，包括子代码组的计算。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. .NET Framework 安全系统将 在策略级别上使用，以确定要从生成的策略语句和程序集上的代码请求中授予加载的代码的权限。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 使用联合语义，并基于 由指定的来形成权限集 `evidence` 。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法来解析代码组的策略。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResolveMatchingCodeGroups (evidence As Evidence) As CodeGroup

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是匹配代码组的树的根。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集，此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果有匹配项，则此方法返回一个根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组包含子代码组，这些子代码组反过来也可以有必要的子代码组，以反映与所提供的证据相匹配的完整代码组集。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 使用联合语义，并基于 由指定的来形成权限集 `evidence` 。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法解析匹配的代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
